name: Keep on-call simple with Ildar Iskhakov & Matvey Kukuy (Ship It! #36)
summary: Gerhard loves simple ideas executed well, which is why he is excited to be speaking today with Ildar Iskhakov &amp; Matvey Kukuy about their startup Amixr, a.k.a. Grafana OnCall. Ildar &amp; Matvey started with a simple idea and a simple stack - Django, Celery, RabbitMQ &amp; MySQL - all running on Kubernetes. Because ...
